message.content: The attitudes towards divorce among women in The Bahamas vary. While some women may see divorce as a viable option to escape from an unhappy or abusive marriage, others might have more traditional views and see divorce as a last resort or even stigmatize it. Many women consider the impact of divorce on their children and the family's social standing, religion, and cultural beliefs when making decisions about divorce. It is important to note that perspectives on divorce can differ greatly among individuals, influenced by personal experiences, education, and societal norms.
